title: Revenue of water utilities - United States 2000 to 2015
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2013 to 2000.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015 to 2014.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2014 to 2013.
gold: This statistic represents the revenue of the water utility industry in the United States between 2000 and 2015 . In 2015 , this particular industry generated revenue of approximately 53.8 billion U.S. dollars .
